long_description: Kids, put on your National Geographic Chameleon Vision Goggles and see the world from this super-cool reptile's point of view! Twist the eyes to look 360deg around you to spot your next tasty bug meal. See predators coming up behind you with the mirrors on either side of the mask. (Or, sneak up on others in your green disguise!). Sturdy plastic mask has a softer plastic around the face for comfort. Elastic strap can be adjusted to fit.
short_description: Kids, put on your National Geographic Chameleon Vision Goggles and see the world from this super-cool reptile's point of view!
